text: Lotus is an unincorporated community in Center Township, Union County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Lotus in 1865, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1903. ==Geography== Lotus is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Union County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Lotus, Indiana
